‚≠ê REQUIREMENTS
- Virgin (unhacked) Nintendo DSi (all regions valid)
- SD card formatted FAT32, 4‚Äì32 GB (recommended ‚â§32GB)
- Card reader for PC
- Stable internet connection on DSi (for exploit)
- Stylehax hack files pack (includes hbmenu.nds or launcher)

Warning: Full backup of your SD card first! This process modifies the console.

‚òÑÔ∏è STEP 1. DOWNLOAD & COPY HACK FILES
- Download pack from provided URL.
- Extract ALL files directly to the ROOT of the SD card.
- Ensure there is a file named boot.nds (could be hbmenu.nds renamed).

‚òÑÔ∏è STEP 2. SET UP NETWORK ON DSi
- Go to Settings ‚Üí Internet ‚Üí Connection 1 (or your connection).
- If network not compatible, try another or create new.
- In Advanced Settings ‚Üí Connection 4 (or similar), set manual DNS if needed (e.g. Google: 8.8.8.8).

‚òÑÔ∏è STEP 3. RUN THE EXPLOIT
- Power on DSi and launch Internet Browser.
- Type exactly: http://stylehax.net (or www.stylehax.net)
- Wait 20‚Äì40 seconds (may freeze ‚Üí retry multiple times).
- If SD is detected ‚Üí TWLMenu++ (homebrew menu) will launch automatically.
- If freezes often: try loading opera:about or google.com first (community trick for better stability).
- Still failing? Reformat SD with guiformat (FAT32, 32k cluster) and recopy files.

‚òÑÔ∏è STEP 4. CREATE SHORTCUTS (for easier use)
- In TWLMenu++ open 'apps' folder.
- Run NAND Manager (or similar tool from pack).
- Set mode to SysNAND.
- Go to 'Install' ‚Üí 'apps'.
- Select installer.nds and twlmenu.nds ‚Üí install them as DSi menu shortcuts.

‚òÑÔ∏è STEP 5. INSTALL FULL CFW (Unlaunch + permanent TWLMenu)
- In TWLMenu++ run Unlaunch (from pack or official).
- Choose 'Install Now'.
- Power down console completely.
- Restart ‚Üí hold button(s) if needed to access Unlaunch.
- In Unlaunch go to Options.
- Change 'No Bottom [Launcher]' to 'No Bottom [Filemenu]' (or configure as preferred).
- Save, exit and reboot.

Done! You now have permanent CFW, TWLMenu++ on home menu, and can use homebrew + backups without exploit every time.

Finally: after any hack, make a full NAND backup (using NAND Manager or fwTool) ‚Üí see guide in üìònand-ndsi. Keep this backup safe!
